text: :For the 2007 movie, see Ratatouille (movie). Ratatouille ; French pronunciation: is an old French Provençal stewed vegetable dish, coming from Nice. The full name of the dish is ratatouille niçoise.Ratatouille. Oxford English Dictionary, 2nd edition (1989) The word ratatouille may come from the word touiller, which means "to stir up". It includes tomato sauce and cucumber. == References == Category:French food
title: Ratatouille
